sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './singlePost.css' import { publicRequest } from '../../requestMethods' import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" const SinglePost = () => { const location = useLocation() const id = location.pathname.split("/")[2] const [article, setArticle] = React.useState({}) React.useEffect(() => { const getArticle = async () => { try { const res = await publicRequest.get("/articles/find/"+id) setArticle(res.data) } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } getArticle() }, [id]) console.log(article) return (

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
{/* */}
